# nuon_builtin_sandbox (Data Source)

Provides information about a built in sandbox



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The sandbox name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the app.
- `sandbox_release` (Attributes) The latest sandbox release for the built in sandbox (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sandbox_release))

<a id="nestedatt--sandbox_release"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sandbox_release`

Read-Only:

- `deprovision_policy_url` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `one_click_role_template_url` (String)
- `provision_policy_url` (String)
- `trust_policy_url` (String)
- `version` (String)
